column4: hey guys can someone help me out. the thing is I have installed fluxbox on ubuntu and I need a file which makes me autologin so I dont need to  wrote username  & password inkl startx
gdm or any other similar package should help, although you still need to "login" once X starts, there are probably ways to skip that as well
gdm, xdm, kdm, etc depending on which window manager you use
